item.title: I Will Be Having This Chocolate Bourbon Pecan Pie At Every Single Holiday Dinner This Year
item.description: If you make one dessert this year, first of all, what's wrong with you? But second of all, make it this one.

item.title: Docs: Jack Smith Ignored Constitutional Standards To Target GOP Senators In Arctic Frost Probe
item.description: 'The closer you look, the more brazen Jack Smith’s actions become,' said Sen. Chuck Grassley, R-Iowa.

item.title: An Illegal Alien Stole An American’s Identity For 15 Years. NYT Says He’s A Victim Too
item.description: Every fact in the story underscores the massive cost and toll of illegal immigration.

item.title: Undermining America’s National Security Is Nothing New For Mark Kelly
item.description: For years, Sen. Mark Kelly, D-Ariz., has regularly undertaken actions that undermine America's national security.
